Class Project

java.lang.Object
Project
public class Project extends Object
Stores all data for a project. Data is read from a file or read from the user
Version:
4.0, 25/09/2022
Author:
Ifekharul Islam

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Project(String projName, String projNum, String address, String erf, String buildType, int fee, int paidAmount, Date deadline, Person customer, Person contractor, Person architect)
    This constructs a project with a name, number, address, ERF number, type of building, fee, amount paid, deadline, details of the customer, architect and the contractor.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projName, String projNum, String address, String erf, String buildType, int fee, int paidAmount, Date deadline, Person customer, Person contractor, Person architect)
      This constructs a project with a name, number, address, ERF number, type of building, fee, amount paid, deadline, details of the customer, architect and the contractor.
      Parameters:
      projName - Name of project.
      projNum - Project number.
      address - Site address.
      erf - ERF number.
      buildType - Building type (House, Apartment, Store).
      fee - Total cost of project.
      paidAmount - Current amount paid by customer.
      deadline - Due date of the project.
      customer - All information on the customer.
      contractor - All information on the contractor.
      architect - All information on the architect.

  • Method Details

    • getCustomer

      public Person getCustomer()
      This returns the access to the details of the current customer assigned to the project.
      Returns:
      This project's customer object.

    • unpaid

      public int unpaid()
      Returns the amount left to pay for this project.
      Returns:
      difference between fee and paidAmount.
